Title: Size Matters
Plot: Susan invites Steve for a date at home, and offers to cook. Jeff warns him about 'The Sock Gap', and Patrick alerts him to her collection of remote controls. Somehow everyone's conversation seems to revolve around Patrick's size, and Jeff is asked by several people to accompany him to the toilet to check.
GuestStars: Angus Deayton, Mariella Frostrup, William Scott-Masson, Adam Astill
